name: 42 Macro
title: Does DeepSeek Represent An End to US Exceptionalism?
text:
Synopsis
DeepSeek's AI model breakthrough challenges US technological dominance, demonstrating the potential for efficient AI development with limited resources and despite semiconductor export restrictions.

Key Insights
- DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, developed an AI model that outperformed major US AI models (Meta Llama 3.1, OpenAI ChatGPT 4, Anthropic Claude Sonet 3.5) in accuracy tests
- The model was developed in only two months for $6 million, significantly less than the hundreds of billions spent by US hyperscalers
- DeepSeek successfully trained its model using cheaper H800 chips after being cut off from advanced Nvidia H100 chips due to US export restrictions
- The NASDAQ 100 was down 3% in response to these developments
- Investors are advised to rely on risk management systems rather than intuition when assessing the potential market impact of such technological advancements
